org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Class AeAbstractStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeAbstractStorage
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeCoordinationStorage, AePersistentAttachmentStorage, AeProcessStateConnection, AeProcessStateStorage, AeQueueStorage, AeTransmissionTrackerStorage, AeURNStorage
public abstract class AeAbstractStorage
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract base class that is extended by all delegating storage impls.

          The storage delegate.
